msItem.title: Mujmal al-Hikmah.
msItem.note: Lacks the beginning of the preface and breaks off in the ninth section of the tenth risala of the third qism. A philosophical compendium, consisting of a much abbreviated translation of the Rasa'il of the Ikhwan al-Safa. Headings in red. Some pages on pink or green paper. The tranlator informs us that he undertook the task at the instance of Sayyid Baha al-Din Saif al-Muluk, one of the close companions (khawass) of Amir Timur.

listBibl.bibl: Price's bequest is noted in the Journal for 1836, pp. xii-xiv (an obituary notice p. lx).

bindingDesc.p: Modern blue cloth binding, with title etc tooled on spine.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
